page.title: 18Llandegai School
page.content: At breaktimes the children go out to play.They play all sorts of games such as British bulldog,football,hide and seek.Their favourite game is British bulldog but they have been banned from playing it because they were always falling over.They also play on the climbing frame and roller skates. If it's raining and it prevents the children from going out to play at breaktime,they stay in and either read,play board games or watch films.At Christmas they have a party. Most of the infants like to speak English even though they are nearly all Welsh speakers. Their school dinners consist of chips,beefburgers,baked beans and for pudding they have rock cakes.
